vapor.description: Plays a YouTube video (by name or URL) in vaporwave style.

vapour.description: Plays a YouTube video (by name or URL) in vapourwave style.

earrape.args: <YouTube URL | video name> [Gain dB] [Bass Boost dB]
earrape.description: Plays a YouTube video (by name or URL) in earrape style. **Warning: Loud!** I do not take responsibility for any hearing loss you inflict upon yourself :^)

play.description: Plays a YouTube video (by name or URL) with no effects.

queue.description: Shows the current queue of requested songs and who requested them.

skip.description: Skips the song that is currently playing.

wide.description: Converts normal text into ｗｉｄｅ ｔｅｘｔ.

spacify.description: Converts normal text into s p a c i f i e d  t e x t. `num` specifies how many spaces to put between each word, default is 1.

mocking.description: ThIs iS NoT A DeAd mEmE.

palindrome.description: Converts every word into a palindrome of itself.

vertical.description: Writes a message vertically as well as horizontally.

pyramid.description: Cleverly combines a word and a phrase.

graph.description: Graphs a mathematical function using Wolfram|Alpha.

ping.description: Pings the bot to check response time.

mfw.description: Returns a random reaction image from 4chan. The optional `-nsfw` flag searches NSFW boards as well.

help.description: A list of all available commands and what they do.
